ygData.subject: Harrasment and E'Ci...
ygData.msgSnippet: Here s what s happened since Tuesday morning... 1) Signed on at 5am CST..saw someone on E ci with the Mystical Alliance name by theirs. They were
ygData.messageBody:
Here's what's happened since Tuesday morning...

1) Signed on at 5am CST..saw someone on E'ci with the "Mystical Alliance"
name by theirs. They were nonresponsive..probably AFK. They ran off and I
continued to try and say Hi to them and they ignored me.

2) Talked to a Tigerhawk Wensday morning. VERY nice person. I asked him
about the guild and he told me he knew it was a
Gay/Bi/Lesbian/Transgendered etc. guild and loved the idea.

3) Wensday afternoon I spoke with the Guild leader (Tarismo), and it wasn't
David, and he was very upset that 'we' were trying to take HIS guild away
from him. He told me it was DEFINATELY NOT based on what we had intended as
a guild, even though Tigerhawk said differently. He said that HE was first
and he would NOT allow ANYONE to take the guild away from him. I told him
that there must be a mix up and he should contact Verant to clear it up. He
exploded on me about that. I told him he should talk to a GM and not yell
at me because I had no power. After this he refused to reply to any tells.

4) I petitioned a junior GM and told them about the guild mixup etc. and he
promised to esculate it to the powers that be. I thanked him and went about
my gaming.

5) At 11:45 pm I was getting ready to log after a lot of fun at Lake Rather
when I got a tell from one of their members accusing me of starting rumors.
He was VERY mean and would not listen to reason. I explained what had
happened and why the confusion but he then became more abusive. After a
minute or so, several other of their guild started sending really mean..and
I DO mean EVIL tells to me about this. I told them to let Verant/GMs take
it from here but they verbally assaulted over and over. I eventually calmed
them down and logged for the night.

Man...this is crazy. I don't KNOW what's happened but I think David is
right that we may have to delete the guild and start over again. Though
with people like I met last night, I think it will be rather rough trying
to parley with them about this mix up.


Sandy
